channel.title: What are you looking for in a server?
channel.description: I'd just like to see what you all would like to see in a server. Please try to keep the content below the graphics update in RS (498 I think?). Why do I want to know this? Because I would like to take ideas from the community and build off of them. Remember, only post your ideas/thoughts/opinions if you would like me to build off of them, don't post them and then later say 'you stole my idea'. Thanks.

item.title: What are you looking for in a server?
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

I am looking for an RSPS that has all the stereotypical content from a PI with more unique content, a dedicated development team, mature staff and more…

Read full topic
item.source: What are you looking for in a server?

item.title: What are you looking for in a server?
item.dc:creator: @MacaYork MacaYork
item.description:
@MacaYork wrote:

a wide variety of monsters to kill

every single ‘boss’ monster would keep someone like me entertained for a while

Read full topic
item.source: What are you looking for in a server?

item.title: What are you looking for in a server?
item.dc:creator: @Spear_yes Spear_yes
item.description:
@Spear_yes wrote:

Looking for some more suggestions.

item.source: What are you looking for in a server?

item.title: What are you looking for in a server?
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Dokan42:

Bronze being the best armor, mithril being the rarest item in game.

What? Why? That would be irregular, not custom really. People do enjoy custom content, but they still enjoy the old content that they had when it comes to the skills themselves, because they are used to it already.

Read full topic
item.source: What are you looking for in a server?

item.title: What are you looking for in a server?
item.dc:creator: @Spear_yes Spear_yes
item.description:
@Spear_yes wrote:

vManlyMan:

New content. Quests/Miningames/Skills that were never in RS, or any private server.

I can insure you that quests and minigames (custom) will be added into the server. I’m not sure about skills though. Thanks for the suggestion.

Read full topic
item.source: What are you looking for in a server?

item.title: What are you looking for in a server?
item.dc:creator: @Spear_yes Spear_yes
item.description:
@Spear_yes wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:3, topic:478453”]My favorite RS past time was the minigames, so… tons of minigames.

Construction, mainly unique stuff, but I honestly hate seeing custom content. Anything that’s been in RS that not many people think about adding

like that Miscellania island comes to mind[/quote]

Good idea. We have actually added a lot of areas that most people don’t really think of adding. Thanks for your idea.

Read full topic
item.source: What are you looking for in a server?

like that Miscellania island comes to mind
